# Law Enforcement Officers in Schools by State

Map of percentage of schools with law enforcement officers by state.


## Source

U.S. Dept. of Education: Civil Rights Data Collection 2013-14 

## Selecting the data

See [this section](https://render.githubusercontent.com/view/ipynb?commit=5e0d1af0442f48b28fc373ffceb82a2a91601268&enc_&nwo=nprapps%2Fcrdc1314-analysis&path=CRDC+2013-14+Analysis.ipynb&repository_id=61722872&repository_type=Repository#Schools-with-officers) in the [analysis Jupyter notebook](https://github.com/nprapps/crdc1314-analysis/blob/master/CRDC%202013-14%20Analysis.ipynb) to see the SQL query that selected the data.
